languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
• Performs limited production assembly routine/repetitive in nature in which the primary responsibility includes lamp inspections to a standard set by established documentation.
  • Also performs routine duties such as loading/unloading lamp making equipment, clearing external jams, parts preparation, assembly operations, packing lamps, etc.
  • Maintains relevant record/documents and maybe responsible for periodic computerized data entry.
  • Uses small hand tools and may operate semi-automatic assembly equipment.
  • May be asked to assist in restocking raw materials.

Job_Posting_Qualification_Information.qualificationEN:
• High School graduate or equivalent preferred.
  • Must be able to fulfill the physical requirements of the job.

  • Willing to work in Hillsboro, NH


OSRAM is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, national origin, age, disability, gender identity, or veteran status. If you are an individual with a disability and require a reasonable accommodation to complete any part of the application process, you may contact us at HRServices@osram.com for assistance.

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
• Modeling of novel chips using optical (focus), electrical, and thermal simulation techniques
  • Design of the chip’s active region by coupled carrier-transport and optical modeling
  • Support of device development teams from idea to product
  • Development, validation, and application of complex multi-physics simulation models
  • Trigger and follow-up of necessary experimental work for model validation

• Modellierung neuartiger Chips mit Hilfe von optischen, elektrischen und thermischen Simulationsverfahren (Fokus auf optischer Simulation)
  • Design der aktiven Zone des Chips durch Verknüpfung von Ladungsträgertransportsimulation und optischer Simulation
  • Fachübergreifende Unterstützung der Entwicklungsteams von der Idee bis zum Produkt
  • Entwicklung, Kalibrierung, Validierung und Anwendung komplexer Simulationsmodelle
  • Eigenverantwortliche Weiterentwicklung der physikalischen Modelle, sowie aktive Begleitung der dafür notwendigen experimentellen Arbeit

Job_Posting_Qualification_Information.qualificationEN:
• Master or PhD in physics, optics, electrical engineering, material science or a related field
  • Relevant professional experience in numerical modeling and simulation in the fields of optics, and semiconductor physics
  • Experience with commercial simulation tools for optics (e.g. ANSYS Lumerical), device modeling (e.g., Crosslight Apsys) and/or multi-physics modeling (e.g. Comsol)
  • Sound expertise in Matlab and another programming language (e.g. C++/C#, Python)
  • Full professional English proficiency
  • Excellent communications skills and a self-reliant way of working
  • Interested in innovative technologies and working in an international team
Job_Posting_Qualification_Information.qualificationDE:
• Erfolgreich abgeschlossenes Studium der Physik, Elektrotechnik, Materialwissenschaft oder eines vergleichbaren technisch/naturwissenschaftlichen Studienganges, gerne mit Promotion
  • Fundierte Erfahrung auf dem Gebiet der numerischen Simulation
  • Erfahrung in der Halbleitertechnologie, Halbleiterphysik und Optik
  • Idealerweise Erfahrung mit kommerzieller Simulationssoftware für optische Simulation (z.B. Lumerical), Device Simulation (z.B. Crosslight APSYS) und/oder Multiphysik-Simulation (z.B. Comsol)
  • Gute Kenntnisse in den Programmiersprachen Matlab und C++/C# erwünscht
  • Kommunikationsstärke sowie die Fähigkeit, komplexe Zusammenhänge überzeugend zu präsentieren
  • Selbstsicheres Auftreten, zielorientierte und eigenverantwortliche Arbeitsweise
  • Verhandlungssichere Englischkenntnisse in Wort und Schrift
  • Interesse an innovativen Technologien und an der Arbeit in einem internationalen Team

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
• The Data Scientist will be a key part of the Data Science and Analytics department.
  • Develop, train, and implement models that significantly impact the field of data analytics in areas such as supply chain optimization, demand forecasting, urban and digital farming, IOT systems, manufacturing optimization, location-based services, business strategy and more.
  • Ability to identify requirements, scope your research, develop prototypes, and deliver solutions that directly provide value to the business.

Job_Posting_Qualification_Information.qualificationEN:
• Masters Degree in a technical field like Math, Statistics, Computer Science, Data Science, Artificial Intelligence, Engineering, Operations Research, or Physics
  • At least 3 years of experience working within a corporation or consumer-focused environment
  • Proven expertise in data science and analytics for key areas such as probability and statistics, time-series analysis, pattern recognition, optimization, and predictive modeling
  • Ability to clean and transform messy data in Python
  • Experience with data visualization tools such as Power BI, Qlik Sense, D3, R-Shiny, Dash, etc.

languageSpecificElement.posTitle: Industrial Engineer (d/m/w) Capacity Planning & Productivity Improvement
languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
• Projektleitung von abteilungsübergreifenden Produktivitäts-Projekten mit einem motivierten Team aus Manufacturing, Process/ Product Development
  • Analyse und Identifikation von Durchsatz- und Produktivitätspotentialen für Produktionsanlagen, Fertigungsbereiche mittels OEE, IEE, OOE, NonValueAdd und Materialflussanalysen
  • Generierung von Maßnahmen aus den Produktivitätspotentialen zur Zielerreichung gemeinsam im Team&
  • Koordination und Unterstützung bei der Umsetzung der definierten Maßnahmen
  • Kapazitäts- und Investitionsplanung, unter Berücksichtigung von Produktivitätspotenzialen und Produkt-Neuanläufen
  • Ermittlung und Pflege von Kapazitätsgrunddaten, Durchführung von Zeitstudien nach REFA sowie Durchführung von Plan-/Ist-Vergleichen
  • Erstellung und Bewertung von Kapazitäts- und Investitionsszenarien
  • Vorbereitung und Durchführung von Equipmentbeschaffungsprojekten sowie Layoutplanung
  • Ansprechpartner für alle planungsrelevanten Fragestellungen für den zugeordneten Fachbereich
  • Intensive Zusammenarbeit u. a. mit der Fertigung und den kaufmännischen Bereichen

Job_Posting_Qualification_Information.qualificationDE:
• Erfolgreich abgeschlossenes technisches/ naturwissenschaftliches Hochschulstudium, bevorzugt Industrial Engineering
  • Erste Erfahrungen im Bereich Industrial Engineering
  • Gute Kenntnisse von Methoden aus dem Industrial Engineering, Lean Management und Projektleitung vorzugsweise im Bereich Produktion oder Technik in der Halbleiter-/Hightech-Industrie
  • REFA-Kenntnisse erwünscht sowie Grundkenntnisse in AutoCAD von Vorteil
  • Sehr gute Kenntnisse MS-Office/Excel
  • Übersicht auch in komplexen Situationen und flexibles Handeln
  • Durchsetzungsfähigkeit, selbständige und strukturierte Arbeitsweise
  • Klare und offene Kommunikation mit Kollegen und Vorgesetzten
  • Sehr gute Deutsch- und Englischkenntnisse in Wort und Schrift

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
• Perform failure analysis for backend (BE) and new product reliability failures, production failures and customer returns.
  • Support production process improvements, task forces and root cause finding.
  • Hands-on experience in FA tools such as electrical bench verification, curve tracing, chemical decap, mechanical decap, cross section, X-ray inspection, SEM/EDX analysis, die probe, fault isolation, Plasma Focus Ion Beam (PFIB), Lock In IR Thermography (LIT) etc
  • Responsible for failure analysis requests & measurements including failure analysis report review and writing.
  • Evaluation and implementation of new FA methods for support of new product developments.
  • Maintaining and continual improvement of Failure Analysis (FA) operation to ensure its efficiency and compliance.
  • Involvement in ISO17025 lab sustaining activities.
  • Technical advice and guidance to FA technicians.

Job_Posting_Qualification_Information.qualificationEN:
• Bachelorrsquo;s or Masterrsquo;s Degree in Physics, Chemistry, Engineering (Electronics/Electrical/Materials) or equivalent.
  • At least with 5 years experience in Advanced Failure Analysis.
  • Good in presentation, supervisory and multitasking skills.
  • Knowledge in Backend technology and processing will be an advantage.
  • Experience with surface analysis methods like XPS, Auger, TOFSIM is required.

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
• To ensure eQF closure and continue drive for internal quality improvement.
  • To ensure Internal 8D issue for products fail Internal 8D criteria and drive for systematic problem solving technic
  • To coordinate PPCM activity, support Genba verification and support customer pre-audit
  • To ensure customer compliant FAR actions item implemented.
  • Mavericks event and Material Review Board to ensure no defective parts ship to customer & SPC / CPK governing role

Job_Posting_Qualification_Information.qualificationEN:
• Bachelorrsquo;s Degree in Electrical Electronics, Materials Engineering or related field.
  • Statistical analysis software likes SAS, JMP, R and Minitab, Data analytics and Business Intelligence (BI) Tools
  • Minimum 4-5 years related working experience with background in process, product or quality departments.

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
• Own product lifecycle management for assigned Architainment portfolio of DURIS S5 Colors, OSC P2226 Colors, P3030 Colors and COBs for Indoor applications.
  • Explore the biz opportunities for Phototherapy and define measures and actions to penetrate into this market for top line and bottom line growth
  • Own, manage and track product business cases for existing products and trigger new product developments in alignment with the Product Manager
  • Create & own MIND, PL FCST, and U+5 Forecasts for assigned portfolio in alignment with PM

Job_Posting_Qualification_Information.qualificationEN:
• Minimum Bachelorrsquo;s Degree, preferable in Engineering or Business Management
  • At least 3 years in Semiconductor business environment or similar industry
  • At least 1 years in OS Project Management activities

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
• To support reliability testing for robustness, qualifications, evaluation, lot release tests and monitoring.
  • Reliability data and results analysis, update of test status and publishing of reliability reports.
  • Support production process improvement, task force, perform risk assessment for the failure to meet customer requirement.
  • To support New product Reliability readiness which include product understanding (requirement profile), Involvement in Printed Circuit Board (PCB) design for reliability burn in, burn in method and develop measurement programs for reliability testing.
  • Responsible for reliability (REL) process (eg Reliability assembly, Sphere measurement system and Electrostatic discharge testing) related issue and improvement to ensure reliability test conducted per requirement.
  • Reliability engineering activity which focus on thermal studies on burn-in systems, Uniformity Thermal Aging system & thermal characterization systems.
  • Maintaining and continual improvement of REL operation to ensure its efficiency and compliance.
  • Involvement in ISO17025 lab sustaining activities.
  • Technical advice and guidance to REL technician and QCs.

Job_Posting_Qualification_Information.qualificationEN:
• Bachelorrsquo;s or Masterrsquo;s Degree in Physics, Chemistry, Engineering (Electronics/Electrical/Materials) or equivalent.
  • At least with 5 years working experience in laboratory operation environment.
  • Good in presentation, supervisory and multitasking skills.
  • Knowledge and experience in Reliability statistics, burn in method and testing requirement.
  • Knowledge in Reliability test and equipment engineering will be an advantage.

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
• Setup robust process control gate using Advance Process Control (APC) and Fault Detection & Classification (FDC) data.
  • Implement, support, maintain and manage new FDC system to Production for equipment process parameters monitoring.
  • Perform data analyze, compilation and verification for required monitoring data. Collaborate with cross functional team to review and deploy FDC data modelling framework.
  • Involve in ITA/E2E testing and obtain UAT buyoff from user before system is released to Production.
  • Provide 24x7 user support on applications and systems supported. Troubleshoot application related issues and ensure high system availability during full operation.

Job_Posting_Qualification_Information.qualificationEN:
• Bachelor#39;s or Master
  • Automation Engineering, Computer Science, Information Systems or computer engineering
  • APC, FDC, EI

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
• Entwicklung und Umsetzung von FDC Strategien in unseren Fertigungen
  • Konzeptentwicklung und Anbindung verschiedener Sensoren an das FDC System sowie Betreuung der bestehenden FDC und APC Applikationen
  • Bearbeiten und Bewerten von Kundenanforderungen sowie deren Umsetzung in IT-Projekten im Bereich der Automatisierung&
  • Unterstützung bei der Erarbeitung von Anforderungen, Modellierung und Setup der Applikationen&
  • Analyse, Auswertung und Optimierung der IT-Systeme und -Prozesse&
  • Verantwortlich für das Monitoring und den Change-Management-Prozess der eingesetzten Komponenten
  • Analysieren, Beheben und Dokumentieren von technischen Problemen in Zusammenarbeit mit internen Fachabteilungen sowie Zusammenarbeit und Steuerung externer Partner

Job_Posting_Qualification_Information.qualificationDE:
• Erfolgreich abgeschlossenes Hochschulstudium der Informatik oder eines vergleichbaren Studiengangs
  • Erste Berufserfahrung in einem hochtechnologischen Umfeld erwünscht sowie idealerweise erste IT-Projekterfahrung
  • Kenntnisse in Modellierung und Statistik erwünscht sowie Kenntnisse von industriellen Netzwerkprotokollen und Standards wie TCP/IP, SECS/GEM, ProfiBus und OPC UA
  • Erfahrung in Scripting und Programmierung (z.B. C#, Java, Python, Javascript) und Erfahrung in Datenbankdesign (Oracle, SQL, MariaDB) von Vorteil&
  • Präsentationsfähigkeit und hohes Maß an Kommunikationsgeschick sowie hohes Engagement und Teamfähigkeit
  • Selbständige, eigenverantwortliche, zielorientierte Arbeitsweise sowie analytisches Denken
  • Sehr gute Deutsch- und Englischkenntnisse &&

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
• Responsible for the process of MOCVD thin film epitaxy growth, assures the operability and operational goals by sustaining and continuous improving the processes. Key KPIs include epitaxy layer performance, cost, yield, CpK, other process related KPI.
  • Full responsibility of MOCVD thin film epitaxy growth process, inclusive of define DoE within process window, implement process control. Actively liaise with production, process integration and other functional team to ensure smooth operation and meeting process KPIs. Work closely with equipment team in perform troubleshooting of the epitaxy tool software and hardware part with application ofi in situ measurement systems (Deflectometer/Real Temp)
  • Drive continuous improvement in process and identify equipment development potential, support development activities and perform technical transfer from Regensburg FE/RnD.
  • Set-up procedure, buy-off and qualification of new process / equipment together with equipment engineer
  • Ensure process meeting required quality & standard; maintain/ update process documentation, including work instructions, control plans, material specifications, FMEA etc. in accordance to ISO 14001 and TS standard
  • Transfer and start-up of new process from Regensburg FE/RnD
  • Performs material characterization (surfscan, XRD, 4-point probe, SIMS, SEM/TEM, PL etc.). Makes necessary adjustments to the growth machine recipes to maintain growth parameters within the specified limits.
  • Yield Monitoring and Improvement by performing and reporting failure analysis for all the process and equipment
  • related defect using statistical tools, leading to process characterization and improved process stability, throughput, quality and yields.

Job_Posting_Qualification_Information.qualificationEN:
• Preferably a Doctor of Philosophy holder
  • Experience in MOCVD is preferred; experience in sapphire based project is preferred

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
• Responsible for monthly closing activities for Business Groups
  • Analyze financial information and prepare financial statements
  • Ensure accurate and timely monthly, quarterly and year end close
  • Closing & reporting of Fixed Assets
  • Preparation & posting of journal entries for Business Groups
  • Prepare balance sheet reconciliation reports example; bank and payroll
  • Ensure compliance with IFRS accounting, audit requirements and control&procedures
  • Coordinate & support the quarterly and statutory financial audit
  • Support root cause analysis of performance issues and support resolution via collaboration with internal customers.
  • Drive continuous process improvements

Job_Posting_Qualification_Information.qualificationEN:
• 1 - 3 years working experiences in General Ledger or financial analysis is preference
  • Possess good analytical skills, interpersonal skills, independent and self-initiative.
  • Knowledge in SAP.
  • Proficiency in English amp; Mandarin (written and spoken).
  • Experience working in Manufacturing/ Share Services
  • Master/ Degree or Diploma in Accounting or Finance / CIMA / ACCA / CPA or equivalent

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
Du möchtest Theorie und Praxis in Deinem Studium kombinieren? Wähle das (praxisintegrierte) Bachelorstudium, Fachrichtung Informatik bei der OSRAM GmbH und studiere an einer renomierten Hochschule im süddeutschen Raum. Mit dieser Ausbildung hast Du nicht nur Dein Studium in der Tasche, sondern zusätzlich ein hohes Maß an Praxiserfahrung mit folgenden Rahmenbedingungen:

  • Bachelorstudium in der Fachrichtung Informatik (d/m/w)
  • Optimale Verbindung von Praxis und Theorie
  • Einsatz im Bereich Digitalisierung im Fertigungsumfeld, insbesondere MES, Softwareentwicklung/Java, Datenbanken/SQL
  • Tarifliche Vergütung während der gesamten Studienzeit
  • Übernahme der anfallenden Studiengebühren
  • Tariflicher Urlaubsanspruch während der Praxiseinsätze
  • Studienbeginn: Oktober 2021
  • Studiendauer: Regelstudienzeit 7 Semester

Job_Posting_Qualification_Information.qualificationDE:
• Erfolgreich abgeschlossene Fachhochschulreife oder Allgemeine Hochschulreife
  • Erste Erfahrung mit Hochsprachenprogrammierung, idealerweise Java
  • Grundlegende Kenntnisse in Datenbanken/SQL
  • Technisches Verständnis
  • Interesse an Digitalisierung
  • Gute Englischkenntnisse
  • Sicherer Umgang mit MS-Windows und MS-Office

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
• Able to perform all positions on the line and functions as a working production team member when needed and provide training to team members on new and existing standard operating procedures.
  • Ensure workstations meet all Safety, and 5S requirements by being actively involved with the assessment of all workstations per Quality and 5S guidelines.
  • Conducts audits and leads assigned cell&'s rapid problem solving according to production basics; and stops the production line if abnormalities are found and initiates escalation process.
  • Responsible for associate compliance to Production Basics (Training, 5S, Equipment Function, etc.), and responsible meeting hourly production rates / takt time with tracking progress against the production schedule and escalate to the Supervisor if the line is behind.
  • Takes immediate action to identify defective products, limit production loss, and return to first piece standard; and&& &performs machine down time investigation and makes first level repairs.

Job_Posting_Qualification_Information.qualificationEN:
• High School Diploma/GED
  • Must be flexible to work outside of regular assigned shift as needed
  • 3 - 5 years manufacturing/logistics or leadership experience.
  • Must be willing to work 12 hours shifts in weekdays and weekends. Shifts A and C work 9:00AM to 9:00PM, shifts B and D work 9:00PM to 9:00AM
  • The work schedule is a rotating 2-week schedule, based on Pitman shift model. Shift A and B work 4 days/ rest 3 days in 1st week ; work 3 days/ rest 4 days in 2nd week. Shift C and D work 3 days /rest 4 days in 1st week ; work 4 days/ rest 3 days in 2nd week.

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
• Ensuring end-users have proper access to Basis and applications running on it, helping other developers and systems analysts to design and implement new SAP solutions and monitor their performance, and working to troubleshoot problems with Basis infrastructure as well as operability of applications on the system.
  • Executing daily operational activities related to the SAP Environment including object transports, setup/configuration, operational SAP monitoring, troubleshooting and error handling, performance/tuning and problem determination/resolution.
  • Scheduling and executing the SAP transport system, and collaborates to resolve SAP transport and source code problems. &Ensure changes to the SAP environment conform to all audit specifications.

Job_Posting_Qualification_Information.qualificationEN:
• Bachelor Degree and above. Minimum 5 years of related working experience
  • At least 3 Full life cycle Migration Experience, must have Performed SAP upgrades, SAP system refreshes and SAP Installations on different DB and OS, SA HANA DR/ DT, OS/DB Migrations. Must have worked on SAP ECC EHP6 few patches, SAP BOBJ Data Service 4.x amp; SAP Net Weaver 7.3
  • Proficient in the area of monitoring and configurations of SAP Net weaver products such as ECC 6.0, BI 7.3, BO 4.0, EP 7.0, NW 7.0, Solution Manager 7.0. Implementation of Solution Manager, CCMS configuration, Early Watch, Maintenance Optimizer etc and also Applying Kernel Upgrades, ABAP amp; Java Support Packages
  • Good understanding of ITIL process and PMP, SDLC or SCRUM and ASAP methodologies.
  • Excellent organizational skills with the ability to communicate project goals and objectives, project status and deliverables with senior executives. Proven work experience as a project leader. Participate with the management team in developing a vision and strategic plan to guide the organization. Experience working in a global organization.

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
• Selbständige Erarbeitung von Präsentationen und Durchführung von Auswertungen sowie Unterstützung bei Sonderthemen
  • Erstellen von Reports und Tracking relevanter KPI´s
  • Unterstützung beim Personalgenehmigungsprozess und strategischen Personalthemen
  • Mitwirkung im jährlichen Performance Management Prozess
  • Unterstützung bei der Nachfolgeplanung von Schlüsselfunktionen
  • Mitarbeit bei der internen Kommunikation von Organisationsveränderungen

Job_Posting_Qualification_Information.qualificationDE:
• Studienrichtung: BWL, Kommunikations-, Geisteswissenschaften oder vergleichbare Studiengänge
  • Hohe Motivation und Eigeninitiative, schnelle Auffassungsgabe, selbständiges Arbeiten, analytisches Denken
  • Team- und Kommunikationsfähigkeit, auch im internationalen Kontext
  • Belastbarkeit und strukturierte Arbeitsweise
  • Sehr gute Englischkenntnisse in Wort und Schrift
  • Solide Kenntnisse im MS Office (insbesondere MS Excel)
  • Starttermin: April oder je nach Absprache für bis zu 20 Std. / Woche

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
• Provide customer-specific technical information & hardware/software (e.g. application notes, selected samples, application related measurements, concept evaluation/assessments, demonstrators etc.)
  • Provide technical knowledge of application and system requirements that need to be fulfilled by future products and setting up application roadmap
  • Translate customer requirements into product and/or technology 'needs & specifications', and communicate to product managers and R&D
  • Prepare training materials and provide training to field application engineers, distributors and sales
  • Development/maintenance of simulation tools for usage of components
  • Product definition in discussion with system engineering or propose on product roadmap adaptations
  • 2nd level support, e.g. in case of product assembly (SMT, US, cleaning), board design (Level 2 and above products)
  • Involved with specific component development in key customer projects

Job_Posting_Qualification_Information.qualificationEN:
• At least a B.Sc., B. Engineering, B.Sc. Physics, B.Sc. Electronic/Electrical Engineering
  • Minimum 2 years involved in the LED manufacturing / Semiconductors field
  • Preferably with LEDandsensor/driver experience
  • Minimum 2 years working experience in Product Engineering, Product Development or Product Management on the LED Manufacturing / Semiconductors field is preferred
  • International exposure, e.g. working with foreign counterpart / attending workshops amp; conferences
  • Knowhow about company#39;s products/features
  • Deep knowhow in engineering, LED color science/perception, optics, thermal management, electronics, mechanical/SMT or chemical
  • General knowhow in lighting technologies
  • Experience in mobile apps development such as Xamarin, iOS and Android would an added advantage
  • Experience in product development and project management
  • At least basic skills in Microsoft Excel, Power Point

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
• Evaluations of novel epitaxy tool platforms concerning process requirements, automation, usability, manufacturability
  • Definition of the hardware configuration and IT-interfaces for state-of-the-art as well as novel epitaxial tools
  • Lead of hardware projects (new installation and phaseout), define tool strategy and prepare guidelines
  • Drive hardware improvement, optimizes personal/equipment efficiency and find hardware solutions to reduce complexity
  • Extensive collaboration with R&D teams, manufacturing, facility infrastructure, purchasing and supplier
  • Responsible for modified/new components, prioritization and decision on hardware topics

• Evaluierung neuartiger Epitaxie-Plattformen hinsichtlich Prozessanforderungen, Automatisierung, Benutzerfreundlichkeit und Herstellbarkeit
  • Definition der ntigen Hardwarekonfiguration und IT-Schnittstellen fr state-of-the-art sowie neuartige epitaktische Anlagen
  • Leitung von Hardwareprojekten (z.B. Neuinstallationen, Phaseout-Projekte), erarbeiten der Anlagenstrategie und Erstellung von Richtlinien
  • Treiben von nachhaltigen Hardware-Lsungen zur Verbesserung der Personal-/ Anlageneffizienz und Reduzierung der Komplexitt
  • Umfangreiche Zusammenarbeit mit der Prozesstechnik, Forschungs- und Entwicklungsteams, Infrastruktur, Einkauf und Lieferanten
  • Verantwortlich fr neue und modifizierte Anlagen und Komponenten, Priorisierung und Entscheidungen bei Hardware-Themen

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
1. Be responsible for the DS lighting OEM sales in& East China, and contribute the revenue to DS China.
  2. Work as a qualified Sales KA manager to make the OEM move forward to contribute the revenue/success case to DS.
  3. Build up the strategic lighting partners for various lighting applications, to promote the DS light module ,driver, LMS solutions to make the DS brand Recognized and contribute the revenue.
  4. Leverage the lighting partners resources to approach the end users, design firms, LMS partners.
  5. Professionally training the partners/customers for the DS total lighting solutions.
  6. Total lighting solution service to the lighting OEM partners in East China.
  7. Develop the lighting OEM partner& business in various lighting applications: commercial lighting, infrastructure lighting, office/education lighting, industrial lighting, and outdoor/signage/flex business.
  8. Implement the Pull & Push business strategy to influence the OEM customers to accept DS and introduce their local engineering customers to build up DS partner pool for domestic lighting projects.
  9. Cooperate with DS internal teams(OEM sales, PM, CS, MarCom, Project sales etc.) to develop the lighting OEM and gain the market share.

  2. 5 years sales experiences and working experiences in LED lighting industry.

  4. Technical service background and familiar with LMS with hands-on experiences.

  7. Excellent total lighting solution services with excellent Go-To-Customer amp; Result-driven sense.
  8. Project management performance.
  9. Open minded and good communication skill.
  10. Ability to work under pressure.

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:

  • Performing machine schedule maintenance activities in clean room and sub facility with closure SAP PM timely without any safety and quality issue.
  • Sustain the running of the equipment, daily monitoring of all machine & process parameters and addressing line operation issues, ensure the uptime of the equipment with establish and implement preventive maintenance.
  • Perform troubleshooting of the epitaxy tool software and hardware part with application of&in situ measurement systems (Deflectometer/Real Temp) also need to assist engineer's tasks in manufacturing and development environment
  • Transfer and start-up of new equipment, set-up procedure, hook-up, buy-off and qualification of new equipment together with process engineer as team, ensure processes and equipment are compliance to EHS policy.
  • Perform continuous improvement to identify equipment development potential, and support development activities, perform technical transfer from overseas.
  • Carrying out all task compliance to EHS and safety regulations with high sensitivity on safety requirement

  • Experience on MOCVD reactors, high temperature furnaces, in-depth knowledge of electrical, mechanical, pneumatic, vacuum and toxic gas handling principles

  • Provide trainings and contribute to knowledge pool and APC/FDC community. Requirements engineering for APC and related SW platforms
  • Continuous operation and system maintenance. Identify trends and new developments in data analysis for Semiconductors
  • Contribute to data modeling, data governance and equipment integration efforts of DMA on a global scale

  • Experienced in coordinating small working teams in an international context. Proven track record of working in international teams.

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
Position Overview

Fluence is seeking a senior-level Quality leader with global experience, and proven capabilities in managing high-profile, high-value change programs in a high-tech industry. This would include building a Quality Management System supporting a global business. This includes front to back processes, which enable a data-driven, Continuous Improvement culture, coordinating activities across the company/regions, to build a cohesive system focused on delivering cost-effective, quality products, which not only meet the needs of the customer but will continue to position Fluence as an industry leader/innovator, supporting a combination of internal and external manufacturing footprint.&

The functional scope of this role will include the following:

  • Manufacturing Quality Management&
  • Supplier Quality Engineering
  • Incoming Inspection
  • RMA management
  • Document Control

The expectations of the individual:

  • Leadership and Communication – ensure efficient, targeted communication structure. Engages cross-functionally on a global scale, holds feedback sessions, agrees targets with staff and designated delegates, facilitates and monitors effective collaboration, comfortable communicating through all levels of the organization.
  • Continuous Improvement – drives the creation of a process-based, data-driven, Continuous improvement culture, heavy on employee engagement, driving/coordinating the development of processes and systems required to support this culture.
  • Change Management – able to lead significant change management activities, in particular, the creation of a Quality Management System (QMS), and a Continuous Improvement culture. &Proactively informs suppliers, management, and project staff of any deviations.
  • Project Planning – is actively involved in project initiation, analyzing project requirements, and project business plans. &Develops project proposals, including resource plans, project budgets and timelines. Ensures all risks are highlighted and proactively pursued.
  • &Financial Management – ensures visibility and engagement both within, as well as external to, the Manufacturing Operations team, to overall Manufacturing&
    &

Job_Posting_Qualification_Information.qualificationEN:
Required Qualifications:

  • 10-15 years in a variety of roles w/in a Global manufacturing environment, 5-10 years in a Quality management role, including work in a matrixed environment. Hands-on experience within an ERP.
  • Experience in a high growth environment, including significant Change Leadership experience across People/Processes/Systems, including the creation of a Quality Management System (QMS), and a Continuous Improvement culture.
  • Experience with ISO9000 or TS16949 requirements, and experience achieving and sustaining certification to one of these standards.
  • Engagement with both internal and outsourced manufacturing environments, suppliers, and customers on a global basis, towards ensuring defect-free materials and products are provided to Fluence and our customers.
  • Experience with customer-facing engagement.
  • Certified Black Belt, with practical experience in the use of Lean/6 Sigma tools, and the associated quality tools, as well NPI (new product introduction) programs, as well as the ability to teach others in the use of these tools.
  • Strong people, technical and analytical skills, superb written and oral communication skills, and the ability to operate effectively in global team environments.
  • Education: Bachelorrsquo;s Degree required (technical focus)

Preferred Qualifications:

  • Proven Analytics experience (collecting and analyzing data, using data to prioritize and drive action)
  • CQE and/or CQM Certification (or equivalent)
  • Built a global quality network, including outsourced functionality (e.g. SQErsquo;s in Asia)
  • Experience supports the development and implementation of a Customer Satisfaction program.
  • Education: Masterrsquo;s Degree (business or technical)

OSRAM is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, national origin, age, disability, gender identity, or veteran status. If you are an individual with a disability and require a reasonable accommodation to complete any part of the application process, you may contact us at HRServices@osram.com for assistance

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
• Drive automation of federal tax compliance and provision processes, with the goal to create availability for business support and special tax planning projects.
  • Review alternative tax positions in order to determine the most appropriate cost-effective filing position.
  • Provide tax support, including modeling and technical advice for business changes and special projects including working with cross-functional teams to deliver the execution.
  • Tax provision – Supports monthly/quarterly/annual tax accounting package. This includes managing tax provision, review of income tax accounts (current, deferred, taxes payable/ tax reserves), support of the financial statements audit and assist in any other areas of the income tax provision as necessary.
  • Tax compliance – Prepare/review all work-papers and manage timely preparation of the US Federal income tax estimates and returns. Participate in R&D credit, computations of earnings and profits, Subpart F income inclusions, GILTI, FDII, BEAT, FTC’s, Forms 5471, 1118, 1042 and others.
  • Support the Global transfer pricing compliance process to ensure the company follows tax regulations enforced by the various localities.
  • Manage IRS Tax Audits - Compiling data and responses to fulfill IRS information document requests.

Job_Posting_Qualification_Information.qualificationEN:
• Bachelorrsquo;s degree in Accounting, Finance, or other business related discipline with CPA or Masters of Tax.
  • 7-10 years federal tax experience in Big 4 or comparable tax experience in a large multinational corporation.
  • Understanding of international aspects of U.S. taxation including earnings and profits, Subpart F, foreign tax credit and TCJA provisions, as well as their relevance to U.S. compliance and tax reporting.
  • Proficiency in a virtual work environment, utilizing collaboration technical tools including Teams, electronic workpapers, SharePoint, etc.
  • Strong research and analytical skills and attention to detail with the ability to develop and maintain complex tax models.
  • Strong Excel skills as well as proficiency with Word and PowerPoint and familiarity with SAP and One Source Tax Provision.
  • Ability to apply and adapt gained experiences/knowledge to new situations.

• Charakterisierung der elektro-optischen Eigenschaften konventioneller und neuartiger LED-Strukturen

  • Aufstellung und experimentelle Überprüfung von Hypothesen für die physikalische Modellentwicklung zur Erklärung neuartiger Phänomene

languageSpecificElement.posTitle: Ausbildung zur*zum Patentanwaltsfachangestellten (d/m/w) bei Osram in Mnchen
languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
Wenn es darum geht, bei den organisatorischen und juristischen Herausforderungen unseres innovativen und weltweit operierenden Unternehmens den Überblick zu behalten, bist du ein*e Expert*in: Als Patentanwaltsfachangestellte*r unterstützt du Patentanwälte und Fachexperten bei der Organisation des Arbeitsalltags und juristischen Projekten. Bei der Ausbildung wirst du alle Aspekte kennenlernen, die der Sicherstellung der erfolgreichen Anmeldung und Aufrechterhaltung von gewerblichen Schutzrechten dienen. Dabei arbeitest du eigenständig in einer attraktiven Arbeitsumgebung, mit modernen IT-Systemen und wirst von erfahrenen Mitarbeitern begleitet. Du lernst aus den verschiedenen kaufmännischen und juristischen Funktionen wahlweise mindestens zwei Fachgebiete detailliert kennen und erhältst die Möglichkeit, dein organisatorisches und juristisches Verständnis auszubauen und zu erweitern. Das erwartet dich in dieser Ausbildung:

  • Einblicke in die Vielfalt der Aufgabengebiete innerhalb eines internationalen Unternehmens
  • Möglichkeiten, die eigene Ausbildung aktiv und abwechslungsreich mitzugestalten
  • Vielfalt & ein starkes Teamgefühl
  • Berufliche Perspektiven
  • Moderne Arbeitsumgebung
  • Tarifliche Vergütung während der gesamten Ausbildungszeit
  • Ausbildungsdauer: 24 Monate - Abschlussprüfung: Patentanwaltskammer München

  • Kommunikationsstärke & Teamorientierung

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription: Du möchtest Theorie und technische Praxis in deiner Ausbildung kombinieren? Wähle die Ausbildung&als Elektrotechniker*in für Betriebstechnik an unserem Standort Schwabmünchen und studiere parallel Elektrotechnik (Bachelor of Engineering) an der Hochschule für angewandte Wissenschaften Augsburg. Mit diesem&ausbildungsintegrierten dualen&Studium hast du nicht nur einen Abschluss als Elektrotechniker*in für Betriebstechnik in der Tasche, sondern zusätzlich einen Hochschulabschluss als Elektrontechniker*in (Bachelor of Engineering) und bist vollwertige Elektrofachkraft.

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
• Assists and counsels managers, safety & health committee, area coordinators and employees.
  • Evaluates the work environment from the stand point of ergonomics, machine/equipment safety, chemical exposure and any other applicable regulations.
  • Conducts/assists in safety inspection, audits, accident investigations, and trend analysis.
  • Leads/participates in cross functional teams for EHS issue resolution or for new equipment/process approval.
  • Provides consultation and assists with initiatives related to EHS projects and programs to include, but not limited to maintaining Plant's Hazard&
  • Communication OSH Plan, Industrial hygiene, Hearing Conservation & Respirator Training Programs and other programs as required by local law.
  • Supports corporate and insurance visit/audit.
  • Development and manage the chemical safe work practices, institutes and revises lockout/tag-out procedures, confined space/permit program, work permit and, process safety rule procedures.
  • Conducts safety audits, supports inspections & maintains OSHA or equivalent local regulatory required documentation.
  • Provides consultation and oversight for the site environemtal management system including but not limited to establishing training on proper labeling, handling, documentation and overall guidance to facilitate compliance with all applicable laws and regulations. May perform environmental regulatory meeting and audits followed by issuing corrective action and even escalation for issues of non-compliance with governmental regulations and Osram policy when non-compliance is not addressed timely or for repeat offenses.
  • Develop the hazardous incident procedures and trains site Subject Matter Expert’s and employees on proper methods of response control and clean-up.
  • Manages the development, implementation and maintenance of environmental and safety programs such as: management systems requirements (ISO/EICC/OSHAS…etc), hazard communication, control of change, hazardous waste management, reporting site key performance factors, Green House Gas data, chemical management systems and programs, personal protective equipment, dangerous goods – & hazardous materials management, emergency preparedness, regulatory reporting and data collection.&
  • Maintains site environmental permits and complies with all reporting and permit application requirements under all related local and regional laws and regulations.
  • Work closely with Radiation and Laser Officer and support the radiation and laser program of OSRAM&
  • Performs facility tours and inspections of manufacturing operations, office, and shipping areas as well as the facility's grounds. &
  • Ensures compliance with EHS policies including operating procedures and protective equipment & requirements. &
  • Support for the implementation of Global and Regional EHS initiatives.
  • Coordinates with process engineering departments and operations management to review and revise process procedures, chemicals and equipment. &
  • Works with process engineering to identify lower risk chemical and process alternatives to high risk materials and processes. Evaluates site chemical management systems to assure all required elements required for robust controls are in place to comply with regulations and mitigate to the best extent possible risk to employees, the environment and the business. &
  • Supports sites and corporate level functions during international standard certification audits and/or customer standards audits.&
  • Track closely and measure effectiveness of corrective and preventive actions against internal and external audit findings.
  • Manages the external parties on site and monitor their progress activity regularly. All work must have relevant permit before any work starts.
  • Facilitates Osram customer requirements to implement site-regional and/or global certification programs at all levels required. Works closely with Corporate Business Unit Managers to ensure that customer specific EH&S requirements/records are identified, recorded and fully addressed.
  • May be responsible for submitting EHS reports&
  • May perform other duties and responsibilities as assigned.

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
Werde Teil der traxon e:cue Entwicklungsmannschaft und begleite uns dabei faszinierende und vernetzte Lichtlösungen zu entwickeln. Angefangen bei kleinen Installationen, bis zur vernetzten Beleuchtung von einigen der bekanntesten Bauwerke und Monumente der Welt. Durch synchrone Steuerung beleuchten wir ganze Innenstädte und schaffen so ein unvergleichliches Lichterlebnis.

  • Vernetzung und Skalierbarkeit vorantreiben: Unsere Projekte wachsen: Mehr LED-Pixel, mehr Gebäude und mehrere Interaktionswege mit Endbenutzern, Fremdsystemen und Cloud-Anwendungen verlangen nach neuen, kreativen Ideen die du ins Team einbringst.
  • Verantwortung übernehmen: Als Industrial Engineer verantwortest du die Industrialisierung und Serienfertigung unserer Hardware-Produkte, sowie die Entwicklung von Prüfaufbauten, die Betreuung der externen EMS und deren Einhaltung unserer Qualitätsziele. Hier bringst du deinen Entwicklungshintergrund ideal ein.
  • Produkte entwickeln und gestalten: Gestalte zusammen mit der Produktplanung Anforderungen und Konzepte. Entwickle elektronische Baugruppen und Geräte für unser Portfolio, indem du Platinenlayouts designst, Entwicklungsmuster und Prototypen aufbaust und durch die entsprechenden Tests und Prüfungen (EMV) führst.

languageSpecificElement.posTitle: Engineer (d/m/f) for Industrialization and Hardware Development
languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
Become part of the traxon e:cue development team and join us in developing fascinating and networked lighting solutions. From small installations to the networked lighting of some of the world's most famous buildings and monuments. Through synchronous control, we illuminate entire city centers, creating an unparalleled lighting experience.

&

  • Driving connectivity and scalability: Our projects are growing: more LED pixels, more buildings, and multiple ways of interacting with end users, third-party systems, and cloud applications demand new, creative ideas that you bring to the team.
  • Take responsibility: As an industrial engineer you will be responsible for the industrialization and serial production of our hardware products as well as the development of test setups, the support of the external EMS and their compliance with our quality goals. Here you can ideally bring in your development background.
  • Create and design products: Create requirements and concepts together with product planning. Develop electronic assemblies and devices for our portfolio by designing circuit board layouts, building development samples and prototypes as well as leading them through the corresponding tests and inspections (EMC).

• University degree in (electrical) engineering or similar
  • Minimum 3 years of working experience in a comparable position
  • Good knowledge of electronics manufacturing processes
  • Strong expertise in the development of electronic assemblies (analog/digital)
  • Basic programming skills

  • Sehr gute Kenntnisse in der Entwicklung von elektronischen Baugruppen (analog/digital)
  • Grundlegende Programmierkenntnisse

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
Fluence is seeking a senior-level Manufacturing Operations leader with global experience, and proven capabilities in managing high profile, high value change programs in the manufacturing industry. This would include driving a Lean/6 Sigma/Continuous Improvement culture, preparing the Austin site to be the primary source for High Mix/Low Volume Manufacturing, NPD/NPI activities, as well as support for product Innovation programs. The position will also be responsible for managing the external Contract Manufacturing engagements, where volume manufacturing will be accomplished, with a global footprint. product transfers from site to site, organizational restructuring programs, also supporting and driving new product introduction.

The functional scope of this role will include the following:
•&& &Production
•&& &Manufacturing Engineering
•&& &Facilities

&

The expectations of the individual:

•&& &Leadership and Communication – ensures efficient, targeted communication structure. Holds feedback sessions, agrees targets with project staff and designed delegates, facilitates and monitors effective team collaboration, comfortable communicating through all levels of the organization.
•&& &Continuous Improvement – drives the creation of a process based, data driven, Continuous improvement culture, heavy on employee engagement, driving/coordinating the development of processes and systems required to support this culture.
•&& &Project Planning – is actively involved in project initiation, analysing project requirements and project business plans. &Develops project proposals, including resource plans, project budgets and timelines. Ensures all risks are highlighted and proactively pursued.
•&& &Change Management – reviews and determines impact and acceptance for all changes to scope, strategy, or project deliverables. &Proactively informs suppliers, management and project staff of any deviations.
•&& &Financial Management – ensures visibility and engagement both within, as well as external to, the Manufacturing Operations team, to overall Manufacturing Operations financial performance

Job_Posting_Qualification_Information.qualificationEN:
Required Qualifications:

bull; 10-15 years in a variety of roles w/in a Global manufacturing environment, 5-10 years in a management role, including work in a matrixed environment. Hands on experience within an ERP.
bull; Experience in a high growth environment, including significant Change Leadership experience across People/Process/Systems, creating a process based, data driven culture, and driving BPI.
bull; Leadership experience across both internal and outsourced manufacturing environments, including both CMrsquo;s (contract manufacturer) and ODMrsquo;s (original device manufacturer)
bull; Certified Black Belt, with practical experience in the use of Lean/6 Sigma tools, and the associated quality tools
bull; Experience supporting NPI (new product introduction) programs
bull; Strong people, technical and analytical skills, superb written and oral communication skills, and the ability to operate effectively in global team environments.
bull; Education: Bachelorrsquo;s Degree required (Business or Engineering); Masterrsquo;s Degree preferred

Preferred Qualifications:

bull; Experience with Facilities Management

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
Durch den Zusammenschluss von ams und OSRAM bündeln wir unsere Kompetenzen und unsere Innovationskraft, um für den Weltmarkt herausragende Spitzentechnologie zu entwickeln. Hierdurch ergeben sich auch neue Herausforderungen und Chancen zur Weiterentwicklung der Steuerabteilung zu einer globalen und digitalen Steuerfunktion. Wir suchen deshalb neue Kolleg*innen, die uns bei diesem Wandel unterstützen.

  • Organisation und Betreuung der Betriebsprüfungen aller Legaleinheiten des inländischen Konzerns sowie die Organisation und Ausrichtung der „German Tax Konferenz“ zur Etablierung und Koordinierung der Deutschen Tax Community
  • Ausübung der Governance Funktion zur Wahrung der Einheitlichkeit der Steuererklärungserstellung im Konzern Inland (z.B. Behandlung von Teilwertabschreibungen) und zur Koordinierung der Energie- und Stromsteuerthemen für den Konzern Inland
  • Erstellung des Tax Reportings in OTax
  • Erstellung der Erstattungsanträge für Energie- und Stromsteuern und Betreuung der Betriebsprüfungen für Energie- und Stromsteuern
  • Koordinierung der Themen um Einheitswertfeststellung, Grundsteuern und Grunderwerbsteuer (mit externen Berater*innen)
  • Koordinierung und Freigabe der deutschen Anmeldesteuern (Quellensteuer- und Kapitalertragsteuern)

Job_Posting_Qualification_Information.qualificationDE:
• Studium der Wirtschafts- oder Rechtswissenschaften, alternativ Bilanzbuchhalter IHK mit mindestens fünfjähriger Erfahrung in der Steuerabteilung eines Industrieunternehmens oder Steuerberatung, Steuerberaterexamen von Vorteil
  • Mindestens zwei Jahre praktische Tätigkeit auf dem Gebiet der Tax Accounting & Filing in der Steuerabteilung eines Unternehmens oder in einer Steuerberatungsgesellschaft
  • Fundierte Kenntnisse im deutschen Körperschaftsteuerrecht sowie im internationalen und allgemeinen Steuerrecht
  • Sicherer Umgang mit den MS Office Anwendungen, idealerweise auch SAP FI/CO
  • Fließende Deutsch- und Englischkenntnisse
  • Teamfähigkeit, eine strukturierte und sorgfältige Arbeitsweise sowie die Fähigkeit zur pragmatischen und kreativen Problemlösung

  • Mindestens zwei Jahre Berufserfahrung im Steuerumfeld eines Industrieunternehmens oder einer StB- und WP-Gesellschaft mit ersten Erfahrungen zur steuerrechtlichen Abwicklung von ausländischen Betriebsstätten
  • Fundierte Kenntnisse im internationalen und allgemeinen Steuerrecht sowie im deutschen Körperschaftssteuerrecht

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
Durch den Zusammenschluss von ams und OSRAM bündeln wir unsere Kompetenzen und unsere Innovationskraft, um für den Weltmarkt herausragende Spitzentechnologie zu entwickeln. Hierdurch ergeben sich auch neue Herausforderungen und Chancen zur Weiterentwicklung der Steuerabteilung zu einer globalen und digitalen Steuerfunktion. Wir suchen deshalb neue Kolleg*innen, die uns bei diesem Wandel unterstützen.

  • Beratung der Kolleg*innen&aus anderen Abteilungen in Bezug auf umsatzsteuerliche Fragestellungen
  • Fachliche Schnittstellenfunktion zwischen OSRAM und steuerlichem/steuerlicher&Berater*in
  • Mitwirkung bei bereichsübergreifenden Projekten hinsichtlich umsatzsteuerlicher Fragestellungen
  • Weiterentwicklung des umsatzsteuerlichen IKS durch Konzeption von fachlichen Richtlinien/ Arbeitshilfen/ Schulungen/ Kontrollen
  • Mitwirkung bei der Überwachung der Konzerngesellschaften, des ESP und der Vorprozesse in Bezug auf die Einhaltung von umsatzsteuerlichen Vorgaben
  • Überwachung von Steuerbuchungen und Steuerzahlungen im Konzern, Erstellung von steuerlichen Gutachten, Vertragsprüfungen im Hinblick auf umsatzsteuerliche Risiken und Mitwirkung bei Betriebsprüfungen

Job_Posting_Qualification_Information.qualificationDE:
• Studium der Wirtschafts- oder Rechtswissenschaften, alternativ Bilanzbuchhalter IHK mit mindestens fünfjähriger Erfahrung in der Steuerabteilung eines Industrieunternehmens oder Steuerberatung, Steuerberaterexamen von Vorteil
  • Mindestens drei&Jahre praktische Tätigkeit auf dem Gebiet der Umsatzsteuer in der Steuerabteilung eines Unternehmens oder in einer Steuerberatungsgesellschaft
  • Fundierte Kenntnisse im deutschen Umsatzsteuerrecht und im internationalen Umsatzsteuerrecht sowie im allgemeinen Steuerrecht
  • Erfahrung bei der Erstellung von Umsatzsteuererklärungen und ein Verständnis für Accounting-Prozesse
  • Fließende Deutsch- und Englischkenntnisse
  • Teamfähigkeit, eine strukturierte und sorgfältige Arbeitsweise sowie die Fähigkeit zur pragmatischen und kreativen Problemlösung

languageSpecificElement.posTitle: Data Scientist (d/m/f) for AI-based experimental designs
languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
• Develop and implement concepts of AI-based experimental design
  • Application of Bayesian methods on sequential optimization problems
  • Analysis of experimental series based on developed probabilistic models
  • Close collaboration with various development departments, to foster their efficiency in experiments
  • Scale of the developed concepts by trainings and if applicable by tool development
  • Collaboration in further data science projects from various areas of R&D and manufacturing

• Entwicklung und Implementierung von Konzepten der KI-basierten Versuchsplanung (DoE)
  • Anwendung von Bayes’schen Methoden auf sequenzielle Optimierungsprobleme&
  • Analyse von Versuchsreihen anhand von erstellten probabilistischen Modellen
  • Enge Zusammenarbeit mit verschiedenen Entwicklungsabteilungen, um deren Effizienz bei Versuchen zu fördern
  • Skalierung der entwickelten Konzepte durch Schulungen und ggfs. durch Tool-Entwicklung
  • Mitarbeit in weiteren Data Science Projekten aus verschiedenen Bereichen der Forschung & Entwicklung sowie Fertigung

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
1. Development of optical designs for innovative products in the field of automotive LED-modules for the international application in automotive lighting from feasibility to series-production readiness
  2. You design optical assemblies and components considering the interfaces to mechanics, electronics, thermal with special attention to customer relevant interfaces. In doing so you chose the materials to be used based on the designated application.
  3. For the optical design (primary optics, secondary optics, internal optics) you conduct the associated tolerance analysis and ensure a cost efficient manufacturability together with process development, industrialization and where indicated suppliers.
  4. You deliver fundamental contribution to the Design-FMEA of the products
  5. For customers you are technical counterpart for optical questions and support concerning the customer’s application.
  6. You elaborate in the team the optical component specification for suppliers and evaluate the suitability of the components and the conformity to specification in the context of the release process
  7. You create photometric product specifications taking into account standards, legal regulations and customer requirements and realize them in the product design
  8. You create plans for optical characterization and qualification of products
  9. You configure optical measurement technology for manufacturing control and quality inspection
  10. You closely collaborate with colleagues of an international development team and take part in interdisciplinary project teams.

Job_Posting_Qualification_Information.qualificationEN:
1. Successfully completed university education with technical focus (preferably physics, opto-electronics or comparable)
  2. Professional experience in the area of optics and optical measurement technology
  3. Experience with optical simulation software (Lucid Shape, Lighttools, ZEMAX, ASAP)
  4. Experience with development processes in the automotive industry and FMEA method, as well as application of LED-lightsources in automotive area beneficial
  5. Analytical and constructional capabilities
  6. Deep technical understanding
  7. Creative problem solving and result-oriented way of working
  8. Pronounced capacity for international teamwork
  9. Independent working and flexibility
  10. Good English skills in spoken and written

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
1. Development and conduction of tests for innovative products in the field of automotive LED-modules for the international application in automotive lighting from feasibility to series-production readiness
  2. You define and plan tests with development experts using statistical methods like Design of Experiments and conduct them (verification in the development phase, validation)
  3. In doing so you take into account internal and external requirements (standards, legal regulations and customer requirements)
  4. The tracking, coordination and conduction of tests according to your test planning for different sample stages (A-, B-, C-samples) concerning electrical, optical and environmental tests are in your responsibility.
  5. You design and build testing equipment for component and system testing and optimize test sequences by automatization or other measures
  6. By inducing failures on purpose, you contribute to the limit specification of sample parts
  7. You conduct failure analysis and support the root cause analysis
  8. You support the analysis of measurement data, organize expert examination for the tests and document the results in test reports for internal purposes and for the customer communication
  9. Documentation and tracking of the tests are conducted by automotive standards
  10. You conduct benchmarks of competitor products and customer applications in headlamps and fixtures
  11. You support FMEAs concerning test planning and conduction.
  12. You closely collaborate with colleagues of an international development team and take part in interdisciplinary project teams.

Job_Posting_Qualification_Information.qualificationEN:
1. Successfully completed university education with technical focus (preferably electronics, opto-electronics, physics or comparable)
  2. Technical understanding of typical automotive testing requirements
  3. Knowledge in electronics and optics
  4. Knowledge in statistical test planning (DoE, SPC, process capability, reliability)
  5. Programming skills (LabView) beneficial
  6. Experience in test planning and conduction
  7. Skilled handling of testing equipment
  8. Ability of planning, coordination and documentation
  9. Creative problem solving and result-oriented way of working
  10. Pronounced capacity for international teamwork
  11. Independent working and flexibility
  12. Good English skills in spoken and written

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
This position is responsible for managing all activities with Global Supply Chain. In our contract manufacturing model, our suppliers are key to our growth and success. The person in this role will be responsible for working with our assembly and packaging suppliers, both domestic and international, to ensure the on time delivery of our raw materials/products.

&

  • Manage and improve the processes/production and development activities specific to the LED Global Supply Chain.
  • Develop total cost reduction strategies and implement cost reduction programs.
  • Priorities and Support the implementation of multiple source streams in the supply chain.&
  • Work closely with Parent Company and utilize all resources to drive/improve OTD from suppliers.
  • Participate and own regular supplier meetings and manage action items to closure.
  • In collaboration with sourcing group, source and qualify new suppliers for all manufacturing components.
  • Support sourcing in negotiating pricing, terms, and schedules with strategic suppliers&and support supplier development through ongoing supplier audits and scorecard implementation, and corrective action processes.
  • Create and implement Supply Chain Roadmap to support Revenue of the Business.&
    &

Job_Posting_Qualification_Information.qualificationEN:
Seeking an experienced Procurement Manager to development Global Supply Chain. Help drive growth of the company. We are looking for candidates with the following attributes:

  • Bachelorrsquo;s Degree in engineering or similar technology disciplines.
  • 5-7 years of experience in Supply Chain Management, Business Administration, or similar disciplines.
  • Experience with international purchasing and sourcing including ability to interact and work with teams which are geographically dispersed.
  • Semiconductor industry experience preferred.
  • Strong attention to detail and works with a high degree of accuracy.
  • Able to multitask and meet changing deadlins, self-directed and able to complete multiple projects with limited supervision.

Vendor management including issue escalation, follow up and enhancement. Implement neccessary system monitoring as preventive maintenance to ensure system high availability

  • Solving complex problems in design and process in a sustainable and systematic way
  • Deeply analyze and understand interactions between chip design and processes flow

languageSpecificElement.posTitle: Scientist (d/m/f) in Backend Technology / Analytics of material for development of LED packages
languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
• Development, definition and improvement of material analytics and testing in our materials lab
  • Physical and chemical analysis of material and combinations of materials (thermal, mechanical, optical and surface analysis) for better understanding of material properties and preselection for application in LEDs
  • Preparation of material and material composites (polymer, glass, ceramic materials and metals)
  • Weak point and failure analysis of materials due to changing properties i.e. under high load (stress, temperature or light)
  • Analysis of materials of benchmark products
  • Basic evaluation and investigation to understand complex interactions between materials and with other LED components
  • Documentation and establishment of analytics standards and routines as well as automation of tests
  • Exchange of results and close alignment with other sites in Europe, America and Asia

languageSpecificElement.posTitle: Scientist (d/m/w) im Bereich Backend Technology / Analytik von Werkstoffen fr LED Packages
languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
• Entwicklung, Definition und Verbesserung von Materialanalytik sowie Werkstoffprüfung in unserem Materiallabor
  • Physikalische und chemische Analyse von Werkstoffen und Werkstoffkombinationen (thermische, mechanische, optische und Oberflächen-Analysen) zum Verständnis der Materialeigenschaften und Vorauswahl der Anwendbarkeit in LEDs
  • Präparation von Materialien und Materialkomposite (Polymermaterialien, Metalle, Keramische Materialien)
  • Schwachstellenanalyse bei Anwendung von Materialien aufgrund von veränderten Materialeigenschaften z.B. unter starker Belastung (Stress, Temperatur und Licht)
  • Analyse von Materialien in Konkurrenzprodukten
  • Grundlegende Evaluierungen und Untersuchungen zum Verständnis komplexer Wechselwirkung unterschiedlicher Werkstoffe miteinander und mit anderen LED Komponenten
  • Dokumentation und Erstellen von Analytikroutinen sowie Automatisierung
  • Ergebnisaustausch und enge Abstimmung mit anderen Standorten in Europa, Amerika und Asien

Job_Posting_Qualification_Information.qualificationEN:
• Academic masterrsquo;s degree in physics, physical chemistry or material sciences (preferably with PhD)
  • Initial work experience as well as special knowledge in LED materials and/or material analytics advantageous
  • Cooperative, responsible and flexible working style
  • Communicative und team-oriented personality
  • Experience with Microsoft Office, databases as well as statistical analysis tools
  • IT- and programming skills advantageous
  • Good German and English language skills
Job_Posting_Qualification_Information.qualificationDE:

  • Erste Berufserfahrung sowie spezielles Wissen auf dem Gebiet der LED-Materialien und Materialanalytik von Vorteil

  • Erfahrung mit Microsoft Office, Datenbanken sowie statistischen Auswertetools

languageSpecificElement.posTitle: Senior Test Development Engineer (d/m/f) - Focus on IC Test Development
languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
• Development of new as well as improvement/adaption of existing test hardware and software for both Characterization/Validation and Production Testing of electro-optical devices (such as LED or Laser), focused on the ATE test program development for IC-based LED products on wafer level and finished good.
  • Design, layout and realization of necessary test electronics such as probe cards, load boards etc.
  • Program development and debugging of test programs for complex new opto-devices, to be used on commercial ATE as well as proprietary test systems
  • Test support for development samples incl. evaluation and reporting of the test results
  • Transfer of the productive test process to production and provide support in case of production test issues.
  • Support and implementation of the testing development roadmap, the test strategy as well as the testing design rules

languageSpecificElement.posTitle: Senior Test-Entwicklungsingenieur*in (d/m/w) - Fokus auf IC Test-Entwicklung
languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
• Neu- und Weiterentwicklung von Testhardware und -software, sowohl für die entwicklungsbegleitende Charakterisierung als auch den produktiven Test von elektro-optischen Bauteilen (LED, Laser), mit Fokus auf die ATE-Testprogramm-Entwicklung für IC-basierte LED Komponenten auf Waferebene sowie im finalen Bauteil
  • Konzeption, Layout und Beschaffung der erforderlichen Testelektronik wie bspw. Probecards, Loadboards etc.
  • Programmierung und Debugging der Testprogramme für komplexe neuentwickelte Opto-Bauteile auf ATEs und proprietären Testumgebungen
  • Testbetreuung von Entwicklungsmustern und Aufbereitung/Auswertung der Testdaten
  • Transfer des produktiven Test-Prozesses in die Fertigung und Unterstützung bei Fertigungsproblemen
  • Unterstützung und Umsetzung der Testentwicklungs-Roadmap, der Test- und Lieferantenstrategie sowie der Test Design Rules

Job_Posting_Qualification_Information.qualificationEN: COMMON_NOT_TRANSLATED
Job_Posting_Qualification_Information.qualificationDE:
• Erfolgreich abgeschlossenes Master-Studium in den Bereichen Elektrotechnik/Elektronik, Physik oder eines vergleichbaren technischen/ naturwissenschaftlichen Studienganges
  • Mehrjährige Erfahrung im Bereich der Testentwicklung für Halbleiterbauelementen erforderlich
  • Ausgeprägtes Verständnis der Fertigungstestlösungen bei Halbleiterprodukten (z.B. Waferprober, Testhandler, ATE)
  • Erfahrung in elektrischen Messungen mit Oszilloskop, Logic Analyzer etc. und im Umgang mit automatisierten Testequipment (ATE) – idealerweise Advantest V93000
  • Erforderlich sind praktische Kenntnisse von Skript- und Programmiersprachen, beispielsweise C/C++, Java oder Python
  • Kenntnisse über optische Testmethoden und -systeme (z.B. Spektrometer, Leuchtdichtekamera etc.) vorteilhaft
  • Ausgeprägte analytische Fähigkeiten sowie ein hohes Maß an Motivation, Teamfähigkeit und Leistungsbereitschaft
  • Verhandlungssichere Deutsch- und Englischkenntnisse
  • Bereitschaft zu weltweiten Dienstreisen, schwerpunktmäßig nach Südost-Asien

languageSpecificElement.posTitle: Development Engineer (d/m/f) Mold- and Dispensing Processes
languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:

  • Conception and development of new and innovative processes to produce LED devices
  • Definition of appropriate process technologies, process development and equipment acquisition (including machine specifications)

  • Ensuring the transfer of machine and process into the production department
  • Member in project development teams, project management of technology projects
  • Cooperation and realization of the process development roadmap and supplier strategy

• Entwicklung von Mold- und Dispensprozessen zur Herstellung von LED Produkten (z.B. Compression Molding und Jet Dispensen) in Zusammenarbeit mit internen und externen Partnern
  • Konzeption und Entwicklung neuer innovativer Prozesse zur Herstellung von LED-Produkten
  • Auswahl der geeigneten Prozesstechnologie, Prozessentwicklung sowie Anlagenbeschaffung (inkl. Maschinenspezifikation)
  • Lieferantenauswahl sowie technische Betreuung bei der Entwicklung, dem Aufbau sowie der Abnahme der Anlage
  • Sicherstellen des Transfers von Prozess und Maschine in die Fertigung
  • Projektmitarbeit in Projektentwicklungsprojekten, Projektleitung von Technologieprojekten

languageSpecificElement.posTitle: (Senior-) Development Engineer III - V LED epitaxy

  • Extensive collaboration in interdisciplinary teams of experts in simulation, epitaxy, chip processing and analytics

  • Planung und Auswertung von Experimenten und Messungen
  • Tiefgehende Analyse der Prozesse und ihrem Einflussparameter auf Material- und Bauteileigenschaften

    &

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:

  • Detailed amp; strong analytical thinking with excellent communication skills. Good in decision making amp; presentation skills.
  • Configures, and administers cloud computing technologies, infrastructure, and applications to meet the organizations requirements with a focus on operations.

Lead and perform the installation and configuration of cloud management applications. Understanding in semiconductor technologies will be an added advantage.

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:

Recommend and participate in the design and development of needed data sources and development of ETL (extraction, loading and transformation with Python and PL/SQL.

  • Work closely with internal customers, and dedicated technical developers and/or architects to design Data Lake solutions and applications as well as ensuring testing requirements are met and documenting business requirements.

  • Minimum 5 years of related working experience:
    • Working experience with Python (optimal with Databricks)
    • In-depth understanding of relational databases (SQL) and ETL (Extract, transform, load) frameworks

Participate with the management team in developing a vision and strategic plan to guide the organization.
  • Strong knowledge in manufacturing and engineering processes.
  • Experience working in a global organization.

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:

  • To assist R&D team in Identifying & preventing design issues or risks in the early stage of development.

  • Recommend and suggest design/process improvements to enhance the product performance. Provide technical guidance & coaching to R&D peers through knowledge sharing.
  • Support continuous development of leading-edge simulation approaches & advanced material modeling to enhance simulation accuracy and efficiency.

  • Understanding in LED/Laser packaging technologies, assembly processes, opto-semiconductor packaging materials, reliability standards, FA techniques will be an added advantage.

languageSpecificElement.posTitle: Duales Studium B. Eng. Fachrichtung Optical Engineering (d/m/w) 2021
languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
Sie möchten Theorie und Praxis in Ihrem Studium kombinieren? Wählen Sie das (praxisintegrierte) Studium zum Bachelor of Engineering, Fachrichtung Optical Engineering bei der OSRAM GmbH und studieren Sie an der Hochschule Aalen. Mit dieser Ausbildung haben Sie nicht nur Ihr Studium in der Tasche, sondern zusätzlich ein hohes Maß an Praxiserfahrung. Was wir Ihnen bieten:

  • Bachelor of Engineering (B.Eng.) Fachrichtung Optical (d/m/w)
  • Optimale Verbindung von Praxis und Theorie
  • Tarifliche Vergütung während der gesamten Studienzeit
  • Übernahme der anfallenden Studiengebühren
  • Tariflicher Urlaubsanspruch während der Praxiseinsätze
  • Studienbeginn: Oktober 2021
  • Studiendauer: Regelstudienzeit 7 Semester

Job_Posting_Qualification_Information.qualificationDE:
Was Sie mitbringen sollten:

  • Erfolgreich abgeschlossene Fachhochschulreife oder Allgemeine Hochschulreife
  • Technisches Verständnis
  • Interesse an Mathematik, Physik, Lichttechnik und digitaler Optik
  • Gute Englisch- und EDV-Kenntnisse

languageSpecificElement.posTitle: Front End Process Development (Bonder/ Carrier Technology) Staff Engineer
languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
• Key task is development of new process in Bonder/ Carrier Technology until manufacturability with Strong understanding of the interactions between pre-process (litho alignment) and equipment.&
  • Main development role on Bonding and handling specific wafers, design the robust tool and process window and process control, standardization tool config for wafers handling and processability&
  • Lead Tools comparison and able to decide long term Tool and Process strategy. Work with Production team to set up Tool to tool Matching, Process Window study, Online Process monitoring and Fault Detection. Setup overlay monitoring on pre-process with feedback loop&
  • Work with Chip Design team process rule, including set-up the rule, Process FMEA, processes for new product introduction.&
  • Work closely with Regensburg Process Engineering (Process Development) counterparts to achieve fast and reliable process transfers for Performance improvement, cost saving. Support Product Transfer team on Process to transfer and release in Production

Job_Posting_Qualification_Information.qualificationEN:
• Master Degree and/or Advanced Professional licensing (B.Sc, Ph.D B.Engineering, Physics, Material Science, Electrical Engineering or similar field)
  • Fairly extensive ndash; 8 to 10 years (Semiconductor, LED)

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:
• Coordinates and supervises all project activities and operations in assembly process/ integration phase of R&D projects.
  • Coordinate a team of Process Development Engineers and Support Technicians to execute & monitor activities from process development to product realization and subsequently leading to successful mass volume production
  • Plans and administers work, ensuring maximum productivity and cost efficiency from development to product realization

languageSpecificElement.posTitle: Process Development Specialist Engineer (Pick & Place, Encapsulation)
languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:

  • To contribute to effective resolution of chronic issues through innovative or out-of-box solutions.

  • To ensure self development to continually upgrading overall performance by maintaining organizational knowledge through design guideline, design rules, supplier capability, knowledge management system & actively participating in internal and external knowledge sharing (Technical symposium, trade shows, etc).

languageSpecificElement.externalDescription: Wenn es darum geht, bei viel herausfordernder Elektronik den Überblick zu behalten, werden Sie durch diese Ausbildung zum Experten: Als Elektroniker für Automatisierungstechnik betreuen Sie rechnergesteuerte Anlagen in der Fertigung, halten diese instand und warten sie. Auch auch das Herstellen elektronischer Geräte und Systeme für die Steuerung von Fertigungsanlagen ist Teil Ihrer Aufgabe. Die Ausbildungsdauer beträgt 3,5 Jahre. Bei guten Leistungen besteht jedoch die Möglichkeit die Ausbildungszeit zu verkürzen. Bitte bei der online Bewerbung ein kurzes Anschreiben, einen Lebenslauf und aktuelle Zeugnisse mit einreichen.

languageSpecificElement.posTitle: Development engineer (d/m/f) for the assembly and interconnection technology of microLEDs
languageSpecificElement.externalDescription:

  • Design and implement new innovative processes for manufacturing of LED products
  • Definition of suitable process technology and equipment (incl. machine specification)
  • Support and manage technology development projects
  • Ensuring transfer of process and machine into production
  • Support and contribute to process development roadmap, supplier strategy and assembly design rules

  • Erste Berufserfahrung im Bereich der Halbleitertechnologie erwünscht
